title: The Devil Thinks I'm Sinking
lyrics:
Please, don't swim
There's something in the water
Please, don't swim
There's something in the water (close to you)
Please, don't swim

There's something in the water

Please, don't swim

There's something in the water (close to you)

Please, don't swim

There's something in the water

Please, don't swim

There's something in the water (close to you)

Please, don't swim

There's something in the water

Please, don't swim

There's something in the water (close to you)



Can you feel it

The movement across your feet?

Take one last look

Can you see it

The dragging across your feet?

Take one last look

Can you feel it

The movement across your feet?

Take one last look

Can you see it

The dragging across your feet?



Take one last look



Can't even wrap my head around the situation

Can't even wrap my head around you

Can't even wrap my head around the situation

Can't even wrap my head around you



Try to keep your head above the water

Can't even wrap my head around...



Can you feel it

The movement across your feet?

Take one last look

Can you see it

The dragging across your feet?

Take one last look

Can you feel it

The movement across your feet?



Take one last look

Can you see it?



The dragging across your feet?



Weightless and unbound

Weightless and unbound



Until we all drown

The visions will keep us going

Take off these wet clothes

I'm drying off
